You know there is a map in the game. Press tab and then press the compass in here the two flaps to the left is a map one over the area around you and the other is a world map. the next 3 is quest buttons active, quest, compleated quests

This game is radical to the max, but one thing I don't like is how I can't get rid of the high grass landscapes.  I don't mind them except for it slows down my framerate significantly.  Maybe this manual will help.  Thanks Ras!
you can change the distance at which teh grass appears, in the in-game display options.
